[Portrait]Knight Templar
[Dialog]You slew my brother, and I will have
satisfaction of you!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Your brother? Who are you?{END}

Do not play games with me!


I am Meliadoul Tengille. You killed
my brother Isilud at Riovanes!

And now you will die! Not by any
order of His Holiness. I do this
for Isilud!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]You say Isilud was your brother. But I am not
your brother's killer!
Do you not know what happened at Riovanes?
The murder done there was not done by the
hand of any man.
An abomination-a Lucavi killed your brother!{END}

[Portrait]Meliadoul
[Dialog]A Lucavi? So the Lucavi again walk among us,
killing for their own delight?
Ha! A splendid tale! But a lie less fanciful
might better persuade.{END}

They keep the truth from you as they did your
brother.

You are puppets, dancing on strings you can or
will not see!

The Zodiac Stones are much more than holy
crystals to be revered. They hold real power,
the power to work wonders.
A power in itself neither good nor evil, but the
purpose your masters would put it to is plain
enough.
Open your eyes, Meliadoul! Let Folmarv deceive
you no longer!{END}

Do you think to convince me with this prattle?
You are a fool indeed!

My father would never deceive me so.{END}

Lord Folmarv is your father!?{END}

[Portrait]Meliadoul
[Dialog]My brother thought to save this blighted land.

Belike some milder course we might have chose,
but what price too high, to see Ivalice born
anew?
Every birth must be baptized in blood.


What hope have you to change the world, you
child who failed even to realize your own
destiny?{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Please believe me! I did not take your brother's
life!
I am not your enemy! The Lucavi are as real as
you or I!

The man who was your father is gone, replaced
by a demon they have taken body and mind!{END}

[Portrait]Meliadoul
[Dialog]Still you persist, <Ramza>!{END}

I shall persist until I make you believe!{END}

[Portrait]Meliadoul
[Dialog]You fight well. Small wonder
Wiegraf fell to you.
Hear me, <Ramza>.
When next we meet, your
blood will soak the earth!{END}
